name: GG Puzzler - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Full soundtrack from GG Puzzler. Specially for the game fans. You will find all tracks in Steam Player or "OST" folder (Game folder).

Soundtrack list:

[SHADOW] - 1. DistraXXXtion #20
[SHADOW] - 2. Push it
[SHADOW] - 3. On the Wave
[SHADOW] - 4. Peaceful Vibes
[SHADOW] - 5. Sunrise
[SHADOW] - 6. Bright Light
[SHADOW] - 7. Good times
[SHADOW] - 8. High Voltage
[SHADOW] - 9. Flash
[SHADOW] - 10. Zero Gravity
